languages.text: {n}Медный шепот отвечает со смесью боли и гордости:{/n} "Мы все избрали путь мучеников. Я лишь помогла им пройти по этому пути к высшей цели".
{n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."
languages.original_text: {n}Медный шепот отвечает со смесью боли и гордости:{/n} "Мы все избрали путь мучеников. Я лишь помогла им пройти по этому пути к высшей цели".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We had all chosen the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

{n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

languages.text: {n}苦痛とプライドをないまぜにしてブラスウィスパーが答える。{/n}「私たちは皆、殉教する道を選択した。私は、その道の最終ゴールにたどり着く手助けをしたにすぎない」
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

traits.locale_text: {n}苦痛とプライドをないまぜにしてブラスウィスパーが答える。{/n}「私たちは皆、殉教する道を選択した。私は、その道の最終ゴールにたどり着く手助けをしたにすぎない」

languages.text: {n}铜语以痛苦与骄傲的语气开了口。{/n}“我们都选择了殉道之路，我只是帮助他们抵达了位于道路终点的终极目标。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

traits.locale_text: {n}铜语以痛苦与骄傲的语气开了口。{/n}“我们都选择了殉道之路，我只是帮助他们抵达了位于道路终点的终极目标。”

languages.text: « Nous avions tous choisi la voie du martyr, {n}rétorque Murmecuivre avec une fierté mêlée de chagrin.{/n} Je n'ai fait que les aider à aller jusqu'au bout du chemin. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avions tous choisi la voie du martyr, {n}rétorque Murmecuivre avec une fierté mêlée de chagrin.{/n} Je n'ai fait que les aider à aller jusqu'au bout du chemin. »

languages.text: {n}Mostrando tanto dolor como orgullo, Susurro de latón responde:{/n} «Todos escogimos el camino del martirio. Yo solo les ayudé a alcanzar la meta al final de ese camino».
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mostrando tanto dolor como orgullo, Susurro de latón responde:{/n} «Todos escogimos el camino del martirio. Yo solo les ayudé a alcanzar la meta al final de ese camino».

languages.text: {n}Mit einer Mischung aus Schmerz und Stolz antwortet Messingflüsterer:{/n} "Wir alle haben den Pfad des Märtyrertums gewählt. Ich habe ihnen lediglich geholfen, das oberste Ziel am Ende dieses Pfads zu erreichen."
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer Mischung aus Schmerz und Stolz antwortet Messingflüsterer:{/n} "Wir alle haben den Pfad des Märtyrertums gewählt. Ich habe ihnen lediglich geholfen, das oberste Ziel am Ende dieses Pfads zu erreichen."

languages.text: {n}Pirinçfısıltı, acı ve gururun birbirine girdiği bir yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Biz hepimiz şehitlik yolunu seçtik. Ben yalnızca onların bu yolun sonundaki nihai hedefe ulaşmalarına yardımcı oldum."
languages.original_text: {n}With a mixture of pain and pride, Brasswhisper replies,{/n} "We all chose the path of martyrdom. I merely helped them reach the supreme goal at the end of that path."
